name: crowdsec
description: CrowdSec is a collaborative, open-source security engine that detects and blocks malicious traffic. It uses behavior-based detection and shares threat intelligence with the community while enabling self-hosted deployment.

features.title: Behavior Detection
features.description: Identify threats based on patterns, not signatures. Catch new attacks

features.title: Collaborative Security
features.description: Share threat intelligence with global community. Stronger together

features.title: Automatic Blocking
features.description: Stop malicious traffic before it reaches services. Proactive protection

features.title: Multi
features.description: Protect web servers, SSH, databases, and more. Universal security

features.title: Bouncer System
features.description: Deploy countermeasures across firewalls and proxies. Flexible defense

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep security data and decisions under your control. Privacy-focused protection
